welcome_message_title: Welcome to Ciudad de la Costa
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ciudad de la Costa, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore everything this wonderful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Empanadas Don Pedro
restaurants.description: Empanadas Don Pedro is a fast food restaurant located in Ciudad de la Costa.
restaurants.address: Doroteo García Lagos (Av. Giannasttasio), Ciudad de la Costa Canelones

restaurants.name: Pizzería Portugalia
restaurants.description: Pizzería Portugalia is a pizzeria located in Ciudad de la Costa.
restaurants.address: Avenida Giannatassio (Marquez Castro), Ciudad de la costa Canelones

restaurants.name: Confiteria y Panaderia Del Museo
restaurants.description: Confiteria y Panaderia Del Museo is a bakery located in Ciudad de la Costa.
restaurants.address: Marquez Castro (Av. Giannatasio), Ciudad de la Costa Canelones

restaurants.name: Mamma Pizza
restaurants.description: Mamma Pizza is a pizzeria located in Parque de Solymar.
restaurants.address: Av. Dr. Horacio García Lagos (Paralela Sur), Parque de Solymar Canelones

restaurants.name: Rústica
restaurants.description: Rústica is a pizzeria located in the city.
